title: CVS to Halt Sales of Some J&J Talcum Powder After Recall
text:
CVS Health Corp. said Thursday it is removing 22 oz. bottles of Johnson’s Baby Powder from pharmacy shelves and its online store in response to Johnson & Johnson’s recall of certain bottles last week, after regulators found asbestos in one.

CVS, one of the biggest retail-pharmacy chains, said it initiated a “do not sell” prompt at its checkout registers to prevent sale of the item during the product-removal process. Customers who purchased the product from CVS should discontinue use and can return it for a refund, the...
